description: For Markie More, the big day is here. The first day of the rest of his life. As he dresses nervously for his wedding, something seems amiss. As his groomsmen, Cole Christiansen and Steven, come to grab him to go, they can sense something is not quite right, and so they sit him down to hash it out, and that's when Markie drops a secret on them. Quite the introduction for Markie, and one that could have a lasting effect on his future.Is that bride still waiting at the chapel? She might be going home disappointed today.Enjoy!
title: Wedding Jitters
